A,B,C = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while B >= A and count < C: 
    B -= A
    count += 1
print(count)

    count += 1

a,b,c = map(int,input().split())
print(min(b//a,c)) 

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(b // a, c))


n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(m):
    if a[i] < 0:
        ans += abs(a[i])

print(ans)
